TopicTitle: Is there any way to change the tweeting?

Articles.Content:
So, ive been playing this game a long time, and that bird tweeting sound you get when you're on the KSC screen is starting to grate.

Is there any mod/procedure that allows me to change it out for something quieter, or more discreet?

So, ive been playing this game a long time, and that bird tweeting sound you get when you're on the KSC screen is starting to grate.

Is there any mod/procedure that allows me to change it out for something quieter, or more discreet?

you could lower the ambient sounds some to make it a bit less pronounced.

you could lower the ambient sounds some to make it a bit less pronounced.

What else does that slider affect?
